name: darkwoods (Magnotron)
description:
Story You were hiking in the forest, exploring the place until night with your metal detector. Suddenly you find yourself being chased by a horrible creature. In all fear you dropped your phone and phone items. 

How to play Follow the lights signals of the metal detector to find your phone and phone items so you can call for help and get out of the forest. This game was made for the International Educational Game jam 2022. the subject was ''Signal'' 

Credits; 

Developed by: Jesper Johansson, Timo Kilel 

Art by: Sjoerd Smit, Jere Punnonen, Yasmin de Jonge
